pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

queryParameters.name: $filter
queryParameters.description: The query used to filter the search results using OData syntax. Filtering is permitted on the 'name' property only and with limited number of OData operations. These operations are: the 'contains' function as well as the following logical operations: not, and, or, eq (for equal), and ne (for not equal). No arithmetic operations are supported. The following is a valid filter example: $filter=contains(namE, 'PATTERN') and name ne 'PATTERN-1'. The following is not a valid filter example: $filter=location eq 'westus'.

queryParameters.name: $top
queryParameters.description: The number of results to return per page for the list operation. Valid range for top parameter is 1 to 100. If not specified, the default number of results to be returned is 20 items per page.

These operations are: the 'contains' function as well as the following logical operations: not, and, or, eq (for equal), and ne (for not equal). No arithmetic operations are supported. The following is a valid filter example: $filter=contains(namE, 'PATTERN') and name ne 'PATTERN-1'. The following is not a valid filter example: $filter=location eq 'westus'.
